title: АТП Перевізники
overview: ATP: The Carriers is a story of true brotherhood on the road, where every kilometer tests endurance, trust, and courage. Artem and Semen are delivery drivers who navigate tough routes, handle emergencies, and fight to keep their struggling transport company alive.Their job isn't just about moving cargo. It's about challenges that shape character, unexpected threats, twists of fate, and facing their own fears. This series blends adventure, drama, and humor — where the road is tough, but the bond of friendship is tougher.
